title: 给大家列出一下RL的模组，不必要的打勾了
author: 我是肖啊肖
txt_content: Advanced Hook Launchers (by EnderLanky) 先进的钩发射器Antique Atlas (by Hunternif) 古老的阿特拉斯AutoRegLib (by Vazkii)前置Battle Towers (by AtomicStryker)战斗高塔Baubles (by Azanor)饰品栏 前置Better Survival (by Mujmajnkraft)更好的生存Better Foliage (by octarine_noise)更好的树叶✅Bloodmoon (by Lumien)血月Chunk Animator (by Lumien)区块加载动画✅CompatLayer (by McJty)版本兼容CoralReef (by primetoxinz)珊瑚礁Craftable Horse Amour & Saddle (by EwyBoy)可合成马鞍和**CraftTweaker (by jaredlll08)编辑器。必要CreativeCore (by CreativeMD)前置Crystal Caves (by Steelfeathers)水晶洞Doomlike Dungeons (by BlackJar72)地牢Defiled Lands (by Lykrast)污秽之地Dynamic Trees (by ferreusveritas)有活力的树。必要Dynamic Surroundings (OreCruncher) 动态环境：信息显示Food Expansion (by Lellson)食物拓展ForgeEntertech (by EnderLanky)前置Forgotten Items(by Tschipp)被遗忘的物品Global GameRules (by Gory_Moon) 全局游戏规则✅Grapple Hooks (by Kloonder)钩爪Iberia (by gibraltarMC)必要硬核modIce & Fire: Dragons (by alex1the1666)冰与火：龙Infernal Mobs (by AtomicStryker)稀有精英怪ItemPhysic Full (by CreativeMD)物理掉落IvToolkit (by Ivorius)前置Just Enough Items (by mezz)JEI物品管理器Level Up! (by Beeto)升级（必要）LLibrary (by iLexiconn)前置（冰与火）Lost Cities - (McJty)失落之城Lycanites Mobs (by Lycanite)恐怖生物Multi Mine (by AtomicStryker)多人开采（好评，不是必要）✅Needful things (by Dyonovan)必要的东西（不清楚）Not Enough Potions (by Tmtravlr)没有足够的魔药PotionCore (by Tmtravlr)药水核心（42种药水）Quality Tools (by TmTravlr)优质工具RealBench (by Prototik)更好的工作台✅Realistic Torches (by Chaosyr)真实火炬Recurrent Complex (by Ivorius)自然建筑生成Roguelike Dungeons (by Greymerk)冒险地牢Rough Tweaks (by Lellson)难度调整Ruins (by AtomicStryker)遗迹Skillable (by Vazkii)技能等级So Many Enchantments (by Shelter_Rin)更多附魔Sound Filters (by Tmtravlr)音效过滤✅Mob Spawner Control (by Pyrofab)刷怪笼控制Switch-Bow (by White_Draco)更多弓和箭Tool Belt (by gigaherz)腰包Tough As Nails (by Glitchfiend)意志坚定（核心mod）Traverse (by ProspectorDev)动态树（前置）Tree Chopper (by DuchLord)砍树modTschippLib (by Tschipp)般箱Varied Commodities (by Noppes)增加其他物品modWaystones (BlayTheNinth)传送石碑Wearable Backpacks (by PuppetzMedia)可穿戴背包Wolf Armor And Storage (CenturionFox13)狼铠XP Book (by Winter_Grave)经验储存书
